title: Random lag/dc in game
body: Anyone else just have a random dc/lag in game? Our entire team lagged while 1-2 of our opponents also did, leading a few of us to die while DCed. Would be nice to know if it was the server or not and whether we can get a loss prevented.

replies.body: Yes at times the server will randomly dc/lag, once everyone in the game dc'd for 5 seconds. I used to have stable ping, but that's a different problem.
